summary: Iteration 46 - Frontend Testing for Inline CSS Conversion (Cedolini, GestioneCespiti, ContabilitaAvanzata). All 3 pages render correctly with inline JavaScript styles. All tabs, forms, and interactions working properly. No console errors or rendering issues found.

ContabilitaAvanzata.jsx: Imposte, Statistiche, and Bilancio tabs working, regione selector functional, data displaying correctly
All data-testid attributes present for testing
No console errors detected during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 46 tested the inline CSS conversion for 3 pages. IMPORTANT: The actual routes are /cedolini, /cespiti, and /contabilita (NOT /gestione-cespiti or /contabilita-avanzata as mentioned in the request). Pages verified: Cedolini.jsx (route: /cedolini), GestioneCespiti.jsx (route: /cespiti), ContabilitaAvanzata.jsx (route: /contabilita).
